title: So can we stop with the stupid aggressive resets every season?
body: Getting demoted because the enemy was plat last season but had bad provisionals and is gold now feels bad man. Like provisionals make climbing absurdly hard at random moments because Riot thinks a 5/5 plat player lost their touch and needs to be in silver games. You guys are screaming about DQ and solo queue not reflecting skill but shit resets do way more harm to ranked than DQ ever will.
